propActiveStep:
Set the active step (zero based index).
Set to -1 to disable all the steps.
propAlternativeLabel:
If set to 'true' and orientation is horizontal,
then the step label will be positioned under the icon.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propConnector: An element to be placed between each step.
propNonLinear: If set the `Stepper` will not assist in controlling steps for linear flow.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesHorizontal: Styles applied to the root element if `orientation="horizontal"`.
stylesVertical: Styles applied to the root element if `orientation="vertical"`.
stylesAlternativeLabel: Styles applied to the root element if `alternativeLabel={true}`.
